nodes.text: Puffer pig bacon was a type of food made from puffer pigs. It was served in the Colossus marketplace during the Cold War. Anglers used puffer pig bacon as bait to catch snarlfish, who proved to have a big appetite for it. The orphans Kel and Eila used the bacon as bait as well. Later, the merchants Flix and Orka took a supply of bacon as they hid inside a cargo container waiting to be shipped off world during the occupation of the Colossus.
